newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD 10,000 METRES CHAMPION BARSOSIO.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-PROFILE OF WORLD 10,000 METRES CHAMPION BARSOSIO.

text.p: Profile of Sally Barsosio, who won the world women's 10,000 metres title on Tuesday.
A talented teenager, Barsosio was fortunate to win a bronze medal at the 1993 world championships in Stuttgart, the youngest world championship medallist at the age of 15.
Barsosio was disqualified after running across several athletes but reinstated following an appeal.
Finished 10th at last year's Atlanta Olympics.
